overview: The poor lumberjack Ali Baba gets unexpected riches when he discovers a robber's cave full of countless treasures. Among the treasures is a jeweled vase with a genie in a bottle. When the robbers realize that they have been robbed, they swear bitter revenge. But they reckoned without the clever Ali baba and his faithful genie.
title: Ali Baba and the 40 Thieves
